data.name: Reveal Your Monster
data.detailed_description:
What is better than beautiful hand-drawn monsters? Beautiful hand-drawn monsters that undress for you when you help uncover them. Challenge yourself in this fast-paced clicking adventure. Enjoy the audio feedback you get for helping them out.

Features

  • 12 different monster types
  • dressed and undressed versions
  • Female or Male version configurable to your desires
  • Exciting audio feedback
  • 7 languages

Gameplay

Select a monster of your choice and try to reveal it. Make them undress by eliminating the brick wall they are hiding behind. Unlock a gallery of colored monsters in the main menu.
data.about_the_game:
What is better than beautiful hand-drawn monsters? Beautiful hand-drawn monsters that undress for you when you help uncover them. Challenge yourself in this fast-paced clicking adventure. Enjoy the audio feedback you get for helping them out.

Features

  • 12 different monster types

  • Female or Male version configurable to your desires
  • Exciting audio feedback

Gameplay

Select a monster of your choice and try to reveal it. Make them undress by eliminating the brick wall they are hiding behind. Unlock a gallery of colored monsters in the main menu.
data.short_description: Use your immeasurable skills and reflexes to uncover beautiful hand-drawn monsters and make them undress for you. All the while revealing your inner monster. Immerse yourself in a world of naughty fantasy.
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Swedish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

highlighted.name: Not what I expected, when opening this sarcophagus
Hugin and Munin would be jealous
It's more than a cat. It's more than a car. It's a jaguar.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nudity and sexual references.
